channel.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
channel.description:
Well, does anyone else? I do. It's a day for spoiled little shits around the world to get what they want for nothing. I am no exception, I am getting some pretty cool stuff. I would rather only get my parts for the bike, and nothing else. If everyone wants to get presents, may aswel call it the "Worlds B'Day".
By the way, I'm not jewish.

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Click Here, post:79, topic:167463”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=226881.msg1950925#msg1950925 date=1198509046]
Anyone else think i’m gay?
[/quote][/quote]
Oh, the irony and the attempt to be funny.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:72, topic:167463”]how can christmas be gay? it cant have sexual orientations, it is not a person, thus, this thread being a total waste of time.
Definition of Gay: gay usually describes a person’s sexual orientation, being the standard term for homosexual

however, you could be referring to:
“carefree”, “happy”, or “bright and showy”
however, this is not how you portrayed the question.

please be more specific?[/quote]Too literal an interpretation.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Religion also gives people a false sense of self-worth. People use religion as an excuse to kill, claiming that God is behind them.

In those situations, though, those people mistake the voice of the Devil with the voice of God.

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Greeny:

Christmas is when most suicides occur.

January the 7th is the most popular day of the year to file a divorce.

Maybe if people didn’t expect so much at Christmas, it wouldn’t be as stressful.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @Ultimacool Ultimacool
item.description:
@Ultimacool wrote:

True,But it does more good then bad.

Greeny:

All religions fail, it’s for people who need that additional mental support of thinking someones watching over for them because they’re secretly depressed.

Also ill be sure to ask Jesus to save you from the fires of hell.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“Ultimacool, post:59, topic:167463”]The Bible actually does prove everything.The apostles tell about Jesus and all the miracles he worked.
Plus Seeing Is not beliving[/quote]

It’s been rewritten God knows how many times, it’s no doubt corrupt. Even so, it’s not solid in it’s original form.

Sorry, but writing proves nothing.

Yet you believe text on the screen you read from?

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Ultimacool, post:59, topic:167463”][quote author=lawl link=topic=226881.msg1957856#msg1957856 date=1198838473]

Christmas fucking sucks. A commercialized holiday celebrating the birth of a fictional character. Yeah, I see the point in that.

Jesus isnt a work of fiction.Theres something called the Bible where the apostles have written the preaching of Jesus.Plus their is proof that Jesus existed,(Bible,Paintings,Witnesses)

the bible does not prove anything, nor do paintings, and how can there be live witnesses if he died 2007 years ago?
[/quote]

The Bible actually does prove everything.The apostles tell about Jesus and all the miracles he worked.
Plus Seeing Is not beliving[/quote]

Sorry, but writing proves nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Else Think Christmas Is Gay?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Santa was supposed to be a real person, but no he couldnt fly and shit lulz.
He went around giving presents to poor kids and orphans every year on the day Jesus was supposed to of been born.

If you ask me, this is about the only believable story about christmas.

Read full topic
